00029 #ifndef _INO_H_
00030 #define _INO_H_
00031 
00032 #include "defs.h"
00033 
00034 //
00035 // Input management structur
00036 //
00037 struct inp_t {
00038   char *ext;            // == NULL -> no extension
00039   root **conn_vect;     // vector of connection pointers
00040                         // == NULL for simple inputs
00041   int key_displ;        // simple inputs: input key
00042                         // otherwise:     input_key - input_number
00043   union {
00044     int ninp;           // otherwise:     number of inputs
00045     root *connect;      // simple inputs: connection pointer
00046   };
00047   struct inp_t *next;
00048 };
00049 
00050 //
00051 // Output management structur
00052 //
00053 struct outp_t   {
00054   char *name; // output name
00055   int index;  // index of the output in the output field
00056               // (used by class inxout)
00057   struct outp_t *next;
00058 };
00059 
00060 //
00061 // class ino
00062 //
00063 //tolua_begin
00064 class ino: public root {
00065   typedef root baseclass;
00066   
00067 public: 
00068   ino(void);
00069   ~ino(void);
00070 //tolua_end
00071   int export(exp_typ *);
00072   int intScalar(exp_typ *, char *, int *);
00073   int intArray1(exp_typ *, char *, int *, int, int);
00074   int intArray2(exp_typ *, char *, int **, int, int, int, int);
00075   int doubleScalar(exp_typ *, char *, double *);
00076   int doubleArray1(exp_typ *, char *, double *, int, int);
00077   int doubleArray2(exp_typ *, char *, double **, int, int, int, int);
00078 
00079   // empty routines, because real implementations want to scan the old yats script
00080   // but excluded all the old parsing stuff. These routines will vanish once we
00081   // have removed all the init and connect routines in objects. Be patient :-).
00082   void input(char *, int){}
00083   void stdinp(void){}
00084   void inputs(char *, int, int){}
00085   void cr_outp(int){}
00086 
00087   void type_err(data *, dat_typ);
00088   void type_err_i(data *, dat_typ, int);
00089   
00090   inline void typecheck(data *pd, dat_typ type)
00091   {
00092     if (type_check_table[type][pd->type] == FALSE)
00093       type_err(pd, type);
00094   }
00095 
00096   inline void typecheck_i(data *pd, dat_typ type, int i)
00097   {
00098     if (type_check_table[type][pd->type] == FALSE)
00099       type_err_i(pd, type, i);
00100   }
00101 
00102   inline int typequery(data *pd, dat_typ type)
00103   {
00104     return type_check_table[type][pd->type];
00105   }
00106 
00107   inline void chkStartStop(rec_typ      x)
00108   {
00109     if (x != ContSend && x != StopSend)
00110       errm1s("%s: internal error: rec() method of successor did not "
00111              "return neither ContSend nor StopSend", name);
00112   }
00113 //tolua_begin
00114   inline unsigned int getCounter(void) {return counter;}
00115   inline void resCounter(void) {counter = 0;}
00116   inline void setCounter(unsigned int n) {counter = n;}
00117   inline unsigned int getVCI(void) {return vci;}
00118   inline void setVCI(int vci) {this->vci = vci;}
00119

00123   unsigned int ival2;
00124   unsigned int ival3;

00133 //tolua_end

00135   struct outp_t *outp_list;     // list of outputs
